title: Gifted skins are gone?
body: My friend gifted me Star Guardian Lulu and Pool Party Lulu not too long ago. Today, i noticed in champ select when i decided to play Lulu, that I couldn't select one of those skins... help?

replies.body: Checked up on this for you, and it looks like those skins were refunded due to your friend issuing a chargeback on those purchases.
